verses.verse: וּבַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <S%H7637><s%> And in the seventh בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> on the first לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have לָכֶ֔ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> no servile לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall do י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> it is a day תְּרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> of blowing יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have לָכֶֽם׃

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <S%H6213><s%> And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פַּ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> young אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> one כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> [and] seven תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> for a bullock שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֖ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals לָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> for a ram

וְעִשָּׂר֣וֹן <S%H6241><s%> tenth deal אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> And one לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <S%H7651><s%> throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H3532><s%> lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> And one חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

מִלְּבַד֩ <S%H905><s%> alone עֹלַ֨ת <S%H5930><s%> Beside the burnt offering הַחֹ֜דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month וּמִנְחָתָ֗הּ <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering וְעֹלַ֤ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering הַתָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> and the daily וּמִנְחָתָ֔הּ <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <S%H4941><s%> according unto their manner לְרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> a sacrifice made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD ס

וּבֶעָשׂוֹר֩ <S%H6218><s%> And ye shall have on the tenth לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <S%H7637><s%> [day] of this seventh הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> of this מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֔ם וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H6031><s%> and ye shall afflict אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> your souls כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> any work לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall not do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7126><s%> But ye shall offer עֹלָ֤ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> [for] a sweet פַּ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> young אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> one כְּבָשִׂ֤ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year שִׁבְעָ֔ה <S%H7651><s%> [and] seven תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> they shall be unto you without blemish יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> having לָכֶֽם׃

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> to a bullock שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals לָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> ram הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> to one

עִשָּׂרוֹן֙ <S%H6241><s%> A several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <S%H6241><s%> A tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <S%H7651><s%> throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H3532><s%> lambs

שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> One חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> alone חַטַּ֤את <S%H2403><s%> beside the sin offering הַכִּפֻּרִים֙ <S%H3725><s%> of atonement וְעֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> and the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5262><s%> of it and their drink offerings פ

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁה֩ <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> of the seventh מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֔ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> no servile לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall do וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <S%H2287><s%> and ye shall keep חַ֛ג <S%H2282><s%> a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7126><s%> And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering אִשֵּׁ֨ה <S%H801><s%> a sacrifice made by fire רֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פָּרִ֧ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first בָקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> bull שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> three עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen תְּמִימִ֥ם <S%H8549><s%> they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> and their grain

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals לַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הָֽאֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> unto every לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> three עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten פָּרִ֔ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> two עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals לָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> to each לִשְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> of the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <S%H352><s%> rams

וְעִשָּׂרׅוֹן֙ <S%H6241><s%> And a several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <S%H6241><s%> tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> to each לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen כְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H3532><s%> lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> And one חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> alone עֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> beside the continual מִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5262><s%> and his drink offering ס

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <S%H8145><s%> And on the second פָּרִ֧ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first בָקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> bull שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> two עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> without spot

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <S%H4503><s%> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <S%H6499><s%> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <S%H4557><s%> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> after the manner

וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> And one חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> alone עֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5262><s%> thereof and their drink offerings ס

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <S%H7992><s%> And on the third פָּרִ֥ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks עַשְׁתֵּי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <S%H4503><s%> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <S%H6499><s%> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <S%H4557><s%> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> after the manner

וּשְׂעִ֥יר <S%H8163><s%> goat חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> And one מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> alone עֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5262><s%> and his drink offering ס

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרְבִיעִ֛י <S%H7243><s%> And on the fourth פָּרִ֥ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks עֲשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H6235><s%> ten אֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

מִנְחָתָ֣ם <S%H4503><s%> Their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <S%H6499><s%> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <S%H4557><s%> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> after the manner
